title: july 1: sos!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the creation of SOS as an international signal. After, she reflects on the introduction of the Walkman. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
